Bridging Module 2012

Advanced Entry into DT228/DT211

Lab A117, Kevin St. (September 3rd - 7th, 2012)

  • Installing the VMWare Player Linux image

    • First program

  • Introduction to Maths resources
Unit Source Code

2

  • Formative Assessment 1: Temperature Conversion Utility


    • Write a command line utility to accept a temperature value and a flag and perform a conversion from celcius to farenheit or from farenheit to celcius, depending on what the user specifies in the flag. You will need to use the float data type to perform your calculations.

  • C Progamming 2
    • More on strings
    • Subscripting of arrays including strings
    • Structures: Programming arithmetic with fractions
    • Applying Greatest Common Divisor and Lowest Common Multiple
Unit Source Code

3

  • Introduction to Number Systems
    • Positional Number Systems
    • Binary
    • Hexadecimal
    • Two's complement
    • Introduction to Boolean Logic and Boolean Algebra

  • C Progamming 3
    • Bitwise operations
  • Formative Assessment 2: Conversion between number formats

    • Write a command line utility to accept binary number as input and to output the equivalent decimal value. Extend the utility to accept a decimal number as input and to output the equivalent binary value.
